Articles.Content: As name implies. Essentially adding a seat or two to the new Cockpit's IVA, behind the captain and co-pilot. Anybody up to it?
Iva's are a pain to make and all the space is pretty much all ready utilized. A complete overhaul of the pod would need to be done.
We already have the Crew Cabin, which fits in pretty well. coughbutitneedsanivapleasecough

We already have the Crew Cabin, which fits in pretty well. coughbutitneedsanivapleasecough

I'm sure that an IVA will be included in 0.26. But don't count on it. Squad has let us down before. But that won't matter because they're overhauling the Mk3, which is good enough for me. I think that they'll upgrade every spaceplane part that wasn't upgraded in the last update.
